name: Anzeigenhauptmeister Simulator
description:
No exceptions!
Make the streets (in)secure as the Master Chief of Criminal Complaints and conquer the leaderboard of the local online watch!

You are the hero the city deserves!

Your weapon? The phone. Your mission? Report road obstructions. Whether it's illegally parked cars, fallen scooters, or other offenses, nothing escapes your trained eye.
Utilize the full power of the traffic regulations and save the city from absolute traffic chaos!

Features

    []Up to 8 players report traffic offenses competitively[]Skillfully dodge pedestrians so you can use your phone undisturbed[]Unlock cosmetic items for your character and your bike[]Play in global or private lobbies
